translations: adv.温顺地；逆来顺受地；忠厚地

phrs.translation: 温顺地, 谦和地, 谦卑地, 卑恭屈节地

sentences.sentence: By this time she was so cowed by the beatings that she meekly obeyed.
sentences.translation: 到了这时候她被这些殴打吓得不行，以至温顺地服从。

sentences.sentence: "It was the best butter," the March Hare meekly replied.
sentences.translation: “这是最好的奶油。”三月兔温顺地回答。

sentences.sentence: "I can't help it," said Alice very meekly, "I'm growing."
sentences.translation: “我也没办法，”爱丽丝很温顺地说，“我还在长呢。”
